hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Amr said:"A man who had been born in Al-Madinah died there, and the Messenger of Allah prayed for him, then he said: 'Would that he had died somewhere other than the place where he was born.' They said: 'Why is that, O Messenger of Allah?' He said: If a man dies somewhere other than the place where he was born, a space in him equal to the distance between the place where he was born and the place where he died

chapter.eng-name: Dying Somewhere Othre Than The Place Where One Was Born
